ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all of the advice.  I think maybe just being stuck in Qyenos without a weopon and not being able to find anything that isn t green to me to kill is
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all of the advice.  I think maybe just being stuck in Qyenos without a weopon and not being able to find anything that isn't green to me to kill is what is discouraging me. I head to Surefall and everything is Red. Are there no more blues or yellows to kill? I'll keep looking, but thanks for all of the information.
 
Denis
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
dbaldwin@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 3:02 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting

I don't want to discourage you Denis, but I can't think of a good reason to
ever play a Human. Maybe you should try another class.

My first character was a cleric and I got tired of
sit-med-heal-sit-heal-heal-med routine. So at level 52, I quit my cleric and
tried a warrior. "The repetitive nature of Melee, Kick, Melee, Kick" seemed
appealing to me. I love my gnome warrior, she is level 56 now.

Every class has boring stages, but if you are bored at level 7, I think you
need a change. Try to read up on some low level quests at
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/ <http://everquest.allakhazam.com/>  . You
also might want to go to some different zones. Seeing a new zone for the
first time is very exciting. Start a new character in a zone you have never
been to before, go look around. If this game is new to you and it is boring
already, maybe the game is not for you :-(

Oh well, good luck my friend!


      -----Original Message-----
      From:      Denis A. Baldwin [SMTP:dbaldwin@...]
      Sent:      Wednesday, June 27, 2001 1:10 PM
      To:      EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
      Subject:      RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without
fighting

      Maybe it's just because my character is a wuss and keeps getting
slaughtered. :)
     
      Maybe I need a weopon or something...
     
      Denis
